hero.title: Afina DAO
hero.description: Afina DAO is a professional platform for crypto wallet management and automation: we host and support your wallets on our secure servers, run scripted activities in testnets and real projects to earn rewards, and provide 24/7 account monitoring.

management.title: Management and Hosting
management.description: We host and support your wallets on our secure servers, run scripted activities in testnets and real projects to earn rewards.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Only trusted team members have access to funds and critical data; upon completion of cooperation, all client information is completely deleted from our servers.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: We provide round-the-clock monitoring of account status, tracking all processes and responding promptly to any changes.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: For process automation, we use Afina — an antidetect browser with which we have an official partnership, increasing reliability and task execution speed.

partnership.title: Official Partnership with Afina
partnership.description: For process automation, we use Afina — an antidetect browser with which we have an official partnership, increasing reliability and task execution speed.

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: Only trusted team members have access to funds and critical data; upon completion of cooperation, all client information is completely deleted from our servers.

businessModel.title: Service Model
businessModel.description: Service on a monthly subscription model — rates depend on the number of accounts and project sets; individual terms, technical support, and reporting are available for corporate clients. Details and legal terms are on the 'About Afina DAO' page or in our commercial proposal upon request.

about.title: About Afina DAO
about.description: Detailed platform information and legal terms

common.welcomeDescription: Your comprehensive knowledge base for everything related to Afina DAO

about.title: Terms and Conditions of Service
about.description: Complete terms and conditions of service for Afina DAO

header.title: Terms and Conditions of Service
header.subtitle: Please read the terms carefully before starting cooperation

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.point1: 1.1. The Organization provides turnkey project management services using UI scripts written on the Afina platform.
section1.point2: 1.2. The Organization does not guarantee receiving an airdrop from projects.

section2.title: 2. Rights and Obligations of the Organization
section2.obligation1: 2.1.1. Continuously monitor the operation of scripts.
section2.obligation2: 2.1.2. Update and add new scripts as new activities appear.
section2.obligation3: 2.1.3. Ensure maximum activity in the project ecosystem within its own choice.
section2.obligation4: 2.1.4. Provide an Afina license for the remote server free of charge.
section2.subtitle3: 2.3. The Organization has the right to:
section2.right1: 2.3.1. Independently determine the list of activities to perform.
section2.right2: 2.3.2. Consider additional proposals from the Client, but is not obliged to accept them.

section3.title: 3. Rights and Obligations of the Client
section3.obligation1: 3.1.1. Pay for the Organization's services in full at the beginning of the month.
section3.obligation2: 3.1.2. Bear the costs of proxies, remote server, social accounts (Discord, Twitter, etc.) and wallet funding.
section3.subtitle2: 3.2. The Client has the right to:
section3.right1: 3.2.1. Submit project proposals for consideration by the Organization.

section4.title: 4. Liability of the Parties
section4.subtitle1: 4.1. The Organization is not responsible for:
section4.notResponsible1: 4.1.1. Suspension or termination of project activities.
section4.notResponsible2: 4.1.2. Non-payment of airdrop by the project.
section4.notResponsible3: 4.1.3. Actions requiring KYC completion or airdrop claiming.
section4.point2: 4.2. The Client accepts the risk of project termination in case of its suspension.
section4.point3: 4.3. Funds paid by the Client for services are non-refundable.

section5.title: 5. Payment for Services
section5.point1: 5.1. The cost of services is calculated based on the number of accounts and projects.
section5.point2: 5.2. The price can be determined on the Organization's website, clarified in the Afina DAO chat, or with representatives @acycas / @kirjeyy.
section5.point3: 5.3. Payment is made monthly, at the beginning of the month, and is non-refundable.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.subtitle: For cooperation inquiries, please contact our representatives on Telegram

pricingPage.title: Pricing Calculator
pricingPage.description: Specify the number of accounts and projects to calculate the cost of using the platform
pricingPage.firstMonthInfo: First month: includes installation cost ($100 per project) + monthly subscription
pricingPage.subsequentMonthsInfo: Subsequent months: only monthly subscription without installation cost
pricingPage.discountsInfo: Discounts: automatically applied when the number of projects increases
pricingPage.newProjectsInfo: New projects: when adding a new project, an additional installation fee ($100) is charged
pricingPage.serversInfo: 1 server ($65) per 500 accounts. Cost is automatically calculated based on the number of accounts.
pricingPage.proxiesInfo: 100 proxies ($1.2 per proxy) per 300 accounts. For example: up to 300 accounts = 100 proxies, 301-600 accounts = 200 proxies, etc.
pricingPage.ownProxiesInfo: When this option is enabled, the client must provide their own proxies for the accounts
pricingPage.specifyParameters: Specify parameters to calculate the cost

privateCommunity.title: Community

header.title: AfinaDAO WorkShop
header.subtitle: A private community for those who want to run UI scripts on Afina and participate in current activities

roadmap.title: What You Get
roadmap.subtitle: Everything you need for effective work with Afina

item1.title: Full Access to Scripts
item1.description: All UI scripts without restrictions. Full versions with all activities and regular updates.

item2.title: Support Until Result
item2.description: First-class support for both scripts and the program as a whole. Help with installation and setup until complete result.

item3.title: Community on Discord
item3.description: Communication in private channels on the official Afina Discord server. Discussion chat, ideas, cases and mutual help.

item4.title: Guides in Notion
item4.description: Detailed text guides and instructions for each project. Tips, nuances, and useful techniques for working with Afina.

item5.title: Your Ideas — Our Implementation
item5.description: Suggest projects for automation. We constantly add new features at the request of participants.

cta.hint: Payment and activation via Telegram bot

benefits.title: What you get inside AfinaDAO WorkShop:
benefits.benefit1: Access to all UI scripts presented on this site
benefits.benefit2: Full versions without restrictions and with all activities
benefits.benefit4: Text guides and video instructions for launch and setup
benefits.benefit5: Script maintenance in working condition + direct communication with developers
benefits.benefit6: You can propose your projects for implementation and automation
benefits.benefit7: Community of people with the same goals: testnets, on-chain activities, farming, etc.
benefits.benefit8: Ready scripts for current activities (regular updates and support)
benefits.benefit9: Clear workflow structure: suitable for both beginners and advanced Afina users
benefits.benefit10: Discussion chat: ideas, cases, experience, mutual assistance
benefits.benefit11: Weekly calls: new projects, setup, answers to questions
benefits.benefit12: Unique guides and video tutorials from developers: tips, nuances, useful techniques for working with Afina
benefits.benefit13: And much more that is constantly added at the request of participants

rules.title: Terms and Conditions
rules.description: Please carefully read the rules for using the AfinaDAO WorkShop private community

item1.text: The Team provides the Participant with access to the private community and current versions of software/scripts, as well as support on issues related to script operation.

item2.text: The Team independently determines the list of activities that will be implemented/maintained in the scripts.

item3.text: Participants may suggest ideas/projects, but the Team is not obligated to accept proposals for work.

item1.text: Publish monthly solutions (updates/releases) and maintain them in working condition within reasonable technical capabilities.

item2.text: Help with problems that relate to scripts (errors, settings, typical questions).

item3.text: Provide access to current versions of software/scripts within an active subscription.

item1.text: The Team does not guarantee receiving a drop, profit, reward, or any result from activities performed by scripts.

item2.text: The Team is not responsible for changes on third-party platforms/sites/networks, blocks, sanctions, RPC failures, captchas, anti-bot protection, changes in project conditions, third-party errors, and any external factors.

item3.text: The Participant uses scripts at their own risk and independently makes decisions about participation in activities.

item1.text: Access is provided for the duration of the paid subscription.

item2.text: If the Client does not pay for renewal within 5 (five) days after the subscription ends — the subscription "expires".

item3.text: After "expiration", repurchase/renewal is processed at the current price at the time of payment, not the previously fixed price.

item2.text: Exceptions are possible only if the Team confirms in writing an exceptional case (at its discretion).

item1.text: All private scripts, materials, instructions, and any parts thereof are confidential.

item2.text: Strictly prohibited: transfer, sell, publish, "leak", forward to third parties, post in open access, create mirrors, grant access to private materials in any way.

item3.text: Any attempt at distribution (including partial) is punishable by removal of the user from the private community without refund.

item1.text: The Team has the right to refuse technical support in case of inappropriate behavior by the Client.

item2.text: The Team has the right to issue a temporary ban or full ban/removal from the community if the Client's behavior is inappropriate towards other participants or the Team.

item3.text: Support is provided only for issues related to scripts/their operation. Questions not related to scripts may be ignored or excluded from support.

item1.text: The Team reserves the right to remove a Participant from the private community for violation of these Rules.

item2.text: After removal, access to materials is terminated, payment is not refunded.

item3.text: The Team may introduce additional restrictions (limits, access rules, material delivery format) to protect the project and community.

item1.text: The Team may update/supplement the Rules.

item2.text: The current version of the Rules is effective from the moment of publication in a pinned message/official post of the community.

item1.text: Payment of subscription and/or participation in the private community means full agreement of the Participant with these Rules.
All questions regarding access/support — to the official support channels of AfinaDAO Workshop within the community.
